items.content: Hungary's Szijjártó Criticizes EU Policy on War in Ukraine - Hungarian Foreign Minister Péter Szijjártó discusses his administration's unhappiness over the European Union's policy on the war in Ukraine. He sits down with Bloomberg's Stephen Carroll in Brussels.
